backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and a booking system with admin‑restricted retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing branding update changes, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the document title and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with main routes and wraps pages in the shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying brand name, navigation links, and contact methods using siteData and contactLinks.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with brand logo, navigation links, and mobile sheet menu using siteData branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering HeaderNav, page content, and Footer in a vertical structure.
Form component that collects user booking details and submits them through useSubmitBooking, supporting prefilled service data and validation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Dialog showing detailed portfolio item info with title, description, category badge, and image.
frontend/src/config/contactLinks.ts: Defines contact info and computed URLs for WhatsApp, email, and Instagram.
frontend/src/config/portfolioSamples.ts: Provides portfolio sample data including categories and a list of sample items with metadata.
frontend/src/config/services.ts: Exports service definitions with pricing, features, and lookup helper getServiceById.
frontend/src/config/siteData.ts: Static site branding content including hero text and about section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated/anonymous backend actors and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query hook for fetching bookings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Handles booking submission by mapping form data into backend fields and managing submission state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, variables, utilities, and custom effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, query client provider, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with cards linking to WhatsApp, email, and Instagram using data from contactLinks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, featured services, and feature highlights sourced from services and siteData.
frontend/src/pages/OrderBookingPage.tsx: Shows an order form gated by Internet Identity login and displays a success message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Provides a filterable portfolio grid and opens a detail dialog for selected samples.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all services with details and features and links to prefilled order pages.
frontend/src/utils/orderPrefill.ts: Encodes and decodes service IDs for use in order page URL parameters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a portfolio/service website’s requirements, features, architecture, and current state.
